column2: Sampling for the 2001 swimming season concluded September 3.  Sampling will resume in July, 2002.
Displayed are Enterococcus counts.  The maximum daily limit is 104 colonies/100 mL
A swimming advisory is declared by the MDC for the following day if counts exceed 104
colonies/100 mL or if the 5-day running geometric mean exceeds 35 colonies/100 mL
Daily rainfall totals from Logan Airport, National Weather Service raingauge
Questions?  Call Kelly Coughlin of MWRA's Environmental Quality Dept at 617-788-4717
